website_summaries.verdict: Bose's Wave Music System improves upon the original in both design and performance.
pros: Simple to set up and use

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work. Very unprofessional.
customer_reviews.text: Recieved it this afternoon. Returning in in the morning, Black unit came with white wireless control unit. No antenna wire. No manual. No paperwork whatsoever in the box! Plugged it in. Lights do not come on. Only radio works, barely. There is no CD player in front of unit as shown in picture on Amazon page. Wireless control does not operate any CD functions. I am VERY frustrated and disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Brian K. Streb

customer_reviews.title: The closest thing to sitting in a concert hall.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality must be one of the best on the market. I often listen to a favorite piece of music, saying to myself, "I never heard that instrument before!" My only negative comment is the remote, which was obviously designed for young people with 20/20 vision. I do not fall into the latter category. I find the print difficult to read because of the font size. I was very surprised to discover that this radio cannot be used WITHOUT the remote. BOSE must have had a very good reason when designing this item, but I can't imagine what it was. Value for money - I'm not convinced. I've given it four stars. Perhaps I'm being unreasonable.
customer_reviews.author: BigRings

customer_reviews.title: I'm not satisfied, I'm thrilled!
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for my 30-year-old Bose Wave Radio that gave out two weeks ago. Saw the reconditioned Wave Radio/CD (and clock radio/AUX player) on Amazon for many $$$ off the original price, snapped it up, and am listening to Bob Dylan right now. Delivery was on the day it was supposed to come, and you would be hard pressed to tell it from new - it carries the full factory warranty. I'm not satisfied, I'm thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Frederic B

customer_reviews.title: Good but no way to reduce bass sound.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for what it is. But being so small I didn't think it would put out so much bass. I wish there was a way to adjust the bass output. It's really too much in my apartment. Kind of silly that a high end piece of audiophile equipment like this doesn't have a some sort of equalizer or way to adjust the sound. Have had it for several years and it's still working fine. I usually leave it on for several days to weeks at a time on a classical or jazz (less bass than rock) radio station when I'm out of town. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Sky

customer_reviews.title: Bose quality, through and through
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my mother for Christmas. She loves it. Plays classical music for her parrots on it while she works on her laptop most of the time. Sound is crystal clear - true to classic Bose quality. You get what you pay for, and this unit does not disappoint. Was also pleased to find that the remote actually functions properly, unlike most players. If you have the cash to shell out for this, and you appreciate excellent quality, definitely go for it. Bose is top of the line.
customer_reviews.author: Zhon

customer_reviews.title: I could not be happier. This radio works even better then I expected
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier. This radio works even better then I expected. The sound is deep and rich. The volume comes on softer and gets to the desired level quickly, I like that feature. The remote is easy to use. I love this purchase. One aspect could be improved by the people at Bose, they could and should have included an antenna with it. I found the stations that I listen to got weak in the afternoons and faded in and out somewhat. A $10 antenna fixed that problem nicely but I was disappointed that Bose did not include such a small necessary item with the initial radio purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rox

customer_reviews.title: ... Glenn on the Customer Service Tech end is the best! Answers calls / returns call unlike some other ...
customer_reviews.text: No Worries- Glenn on the Customer Service Tech end is the best! Answers calls / returns call unlike some other sites- Helps with any questions! Way to Go Glenn- Great Xmas gift for my wife! Merry Christmas Y'all! Thanks for doubling my warranty time! Scott
customer_reviews.author: Scott Eldredge

customer_reviews.title: Bose is fab.
customer_reviews.text: At first I couldn’t turn it on. Ahem. No directions. Well what do I expect. Mine got lost in moving. Very much love these Bose. Good for small rooms. Great sound. Yes, I finally figured out how to turn it on. So sorry. Enjoying the Bose VERY much. Tnx.
customer_reviews.author: Tigertiger

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best personal stereo ever.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize this was used when I bought it, but it was in perfect condition. Everything worked perfectly and the sound was unbelievable. If you want one small stereo for your home, this is it. It is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: anthony delmonico

customer_reviews.title: I love my radio/cd player
customer_reviews.text: I love my radio/cd player, what else can be said. Its great and I love the sound, I do have it in a bedroom, so the area is smaller. When I put it in the living room, it still sounds good, but I would not say amazing, I like to dance around and with it in the living room it is just not loud enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Pam F. Reid

customer_reviews.title: SO easy to use, and sounds Divine
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd CD player/radio from BOSE, and they are just great. You just plug it in, and it works great and sounds wonderful. One of my BOSE units is 20 years old, and is still in use everyday with no complaints. They are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Very Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I own two of these Bose Wave Systems and while they are no match for a large stereo, the sound quality is truly remarkable, especially when one considers the size of the box the music is coming from. How they accomplish this is a feat of real engineering. One of mine is several years old, the other is fairly new and both are without problems. I live a good distance from the FM transmitters and the Boses get a strong signal using just the cord as the antenna; in contrast to my large music system which requires a T dipole.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best things I've ever bought, and I should have bought it much sooner. My old CD changer died long ago, and I'd read mixed reviews of these Bose changers. I'm glad I have it . . . just wish it would do five CDs like my old one did.
customer_reviews.author: dixiepeach

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: it was everything that was promised. WORKS GREAT and good shipping
customer_reviews.author: william mullen

customer_reviews.title: ALL good on my end
customer_reviews.text: Works fine bit dusty but no scratches cant complain... My mother is happy
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: True to Its Reputation
customer_reviews.text: I've had my Wave for almost 4 years. It's been everything I hoped for, from sound quality to ease of use. I've noticed the different opinions offered here about music quality and music systems. Here's my two cents: I have my Wave on top of one of two 20-year old large walnut speakers (left from a discarded stereo system)which I use as pedastals. They accomodated my taste for Led Zeppelin, Allman Brothers, Roxy Music etc. While the bass from the Bose will never match that of my stereo, I have had guests who thought the Bose sound was coming through the SPEAKERS.
customer_reviews.author: Tom C. and Sandra A.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful sound!! We are thrilled with this system. We have had no problems with the cd's not playing or ejecting. We do make sure we first press stop, wait a second, and then press again to have the cd ejected. We were also pleased to be able to plug our iPhone or ipad into the auxiliary hook up to play music from those devices through the bose system. We used a very reasonably priced adapter cord and it worked beautifully! The radio picks up our local stations as well as a very low powered FM radio station we enjoy listening to. We could not be happier with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Kryton

customer_reviews.title: it was in excellent condition
customer_reviews.text: thank you very much...it was in great condition like new.......I have a bose that doesn't work so I'm able to use my bose remote and i have the manual again thanks
customer_reviews.author: Gwen King

customer_reviews.title: Great sound system.
customer_reviews.text: I like the impressive speakers but miss the topside controls of the original model.
customer_reviews.author: lanny

customer_reviews.title: Bose Wave Multi-CD Changer
customer_reviews.text: I have not had the privilege of using this as I do not have a Bose Wave player. I did not understand at purchase time that this would not play independently. This was a mistake for me to purchase as I cannot use it.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Sound is good for its size
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good for its size. Remote has membrane switches, which I assume will soon break. How can you sell a radio for this price and not even have an on/off switch on it? If you lose the remote or it finally stops working, you have bought a brick. Also, an external antenna jack would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Weinstock

customer_reviews.title: Gift to my wife - turns it on in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Gift to my wife - turns it on in the morning and lets it play 12-14 hours every day.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: This system sounds amazing in small to medium size spaces
customer_reviews.text: This system sounds amazing in small to medium size spaces. The only draw back (and this is just my opinion) is the green display. It is an unpleasant color,that to me, makes the system look somewhat dated. Bose could greatly improve the aesthetic of this system by changing the display to blue or white.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin02

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied w. product and the delivery
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied w.product and the delivery. The enclosed documents were a very classy touch. The fact that I can contact someone w.any concerns is very good business. I will tell people about it, and rate A+.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with previous gen Wave radios.
customer_reviews.text: Not compatible with earlier Bose Wave radios. Seems strange since you purchase the CD player as an accessory and the Wave radios last forever since they are so well designed and built.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Great Selller
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be a sound bar for an old TV. Works great for that and plays CDs and radio too. It came a day early and was in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Pitts

customer_reviews.title: the best little radio ever
customer_reviews.text: i purchased this radio for music in the master bath. it sounds wonderful and is very simple to use. i opted for the model with a cd player so my wife could listen to her prefered music while getting ready for the day. the remote is really easy to use and it keeps wet fingers off the radio itself for added safety. outstanding sound from a little box on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Jay S. Granly

customer_reviews.title: Little Space, Big Sound
customer_reviews.text: I have a smalll apartment, but love the sound of music through giant speakers. Well, now I have the Bose Wave System on top of my fridge and, odd as it seems, I have the same sound and clarity that I would expect from a much bigger system. The sounds that emanate from that little box are powerful. I am completely satisfied with my purchase and I would highly recommend it, especially for anyone with little room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: V. Csakany

customer_reviews.title: Anything Bose!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!!!! It’s helping ease the frustration of worjmm I’mmg through buying knock off cartridges for my printer that have made it malfunction. Great sound and price!!
customer_reviews.author: malinda mcreynolds

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but the quality if top notch.  Silly you have to buy a seperate very high priced Bose Blue Tooth and an iPod Connector
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but the quality if top notch. Silly you have to buy a seperate very high priced Blue Tooth and an iPod Connector in 2016...
customer_reviews.author: Thom Mangan

customer_reviews.title: Service great, product no so much
customer_reviews.text: The product did not perform as it was supposed to and did not eject cd's, in fact it still has one of my wifes favorites; however, in the returning of the product the people on the phone were very professional and courtreous. They sent me a return Fed-X label for shipping and the refund was prompt.
customer_reviews.author: bruce timmerman

customer_reviews.title: She said the Bose Wave Multi-CD Changer has great sound and I shouldn't have got her the extra ...
customer_reviews.text: Mom love's her Birthday gift. She said the Bose Wave Multi-CD Changer has great sound and I shouldn't have got her the extra CD player, the basic system would have been good enough for her.
customer_reviews.author: goldpanr

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with our new disc changer.
customer_reviews.text: The first disc changer was damaged in the mail, so I returned it for a replacement. The replacement changer works very well. I am enjoying it, and would also recommend the company I purchased it from. They were top notch in their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Kaminski

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your $$$
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Bose wave system for my father for Christmas. Received it to find out one of the speakers was blown. Don't waste your money unless you want to fix it yourself after spending lots of $$$
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound that this Bose produces. Set up was so easy to do. Just plugging it in and turning it on immediately produced the local stations as well as many more. It was an excellent and easy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Coderre

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Service
customer_reviews.text: Humble Living is a stellar merchant. My Bose is excellent . Skipped a little on old cd. HL sent me a lens cleaner, problem solved. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Bose Wave Music System.
customer_reviews.text: The Bose Wave Music System has a vibrant sound that is able to fill a room. CDs have sounds that haven't been heard previously on our old system. The pitch and tone range excels. The sound system receives high grades for ease of use. The only concern is with the remote control. It is small and difficult to locate (ours is black) at night. Glow in the dark strips would solve this problem. The Bose will provide musical enjoyment for many years.
customer_reviews.author: F. W.

customer_reviews.title: I was so glad to find one of the players One I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so glad to find one of the players One I have dieddied and you're no longer in production from Bose stores
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Works well, payed to much for a older model ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, payed to much for a older model.could have gotten a brand new one for a few dollars more. My own fault for not doing research on the product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bretzman

customer_reviews.title: Can't ask for anything better
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to my Bose Wave music system. Makes listening to favorite music a breeze. Love the compact design, too.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: The sound so perfectly clear we both enjoy this!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Gift for my Husband. WOW ! The sound so perfectly clear we both enjoy this!
customer_reviews.author: xeno

customer_reviews.title: mitey fine cd changer
customer_reviews.text: ....got this cd changer just the other day.....hooked it up and off we go.....worked well rite out of the box.....
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sound!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome piece of equipment! Everyone should have this in their homes. Crystal clear sounding music, not to mention the caliber of listening to it when turned up to a louder sound. Thanks for a product made well done! Patricia
customer_reviews.author: pgonzalez10

customer_reviews.title: Although this is not the current model My Bose met my expectations Luv-Luv-Love it
customer_reviews.text: Even though I have an older model the product lives up to my expectations-I just Luv-luv-Love it-This is my 2nd Bose and the name stands for a qualified product.My first Bose Radio just gve out after several years of being packed and moved many times over-Product worth the investment-You won't be disappointed-Happy customer
customer_reviews.author: CWhigham

customer_reviews.title: Product faulty. Policy poor!
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with their add-on CD. Changer. Sent it back once for repair and it broke again. Cost to repair : $75 + ... Broken again and the will not repair unless I pay another $75+ I am retired and disabled, too much for me.
customer_reviews.author: David & Joan Bloomberg

customer_reviews.title: I Love My Bose Wave Music System!
customer_reviews.text: The Price was Right for Me!! I Love My Bose Wave Music System!
customer_reviews.author: DJG239

customer_reviews.title: I love Bose products
customer_reviews.text: I love this system! It functions as if brand new. The sound us very good and it is truly a plug and play, what a pleasure!
customer_reviews.author: Penny M.

customer_reviews.title: but the Bose Radio are great in good shape
customer_reviews.text: I'm buy in used condition, but the Bose Radio are great in good shape. Excellent function, sound and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Arnaldo Ramos-quiles

customer_reviews.title: Bose is the best
customer_reviews.text: Love the Wave. Great sound. Works great. The only thing better would be if it were blue tooth. Love this small music system
customer_reviews.author: LovinShopping

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sound
customer_reviews.text: It's Bose, what else is there to say? I got this with reward points on a credit card and it is great! Love the remote and the fact there aren't any actual buttons on the unit, so clean!
customer_reviews.author: Melva Gann

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I ever made
customer_reviews.text: This item was a thrill for the whole family. They could not wait to set it up. I had been on ever since. Visitors have asked where the great sound is coming from. When shown the Bose Wave, they have said they will get themselves one.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Monahan

customer_reviews.title: Bose Wave Music System
customer_reviews.text: The music system I received for my wife's Christmas present exceeded our expectations. The product quality is superb and the shipping was very timely. I would highly recommend this system to anyone that has a love for music. They will not be disappointed. I really believe they will be ecstatic.
customer_reviews.author: joey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have a large room that I wanted to cover with sound and nothing could have done a better job
customer_reviews.author: Dalton A. Tate, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely happy with it and the price of $186
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely happy with it and the price of $186.00 new in the box made it even better. Think it might be important to note that I was able to trade in my old wave radio which was not compatible with the multi cd player for $250.00 toward new up to date version. Do not know if this is common knowledge so do not discard old out of date Bose items.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck L.

customer_reviews.title: Loads 5 CD's vs the new system 1 CD
customer_reviews.text: Loads 5 CD's which is much Better than the new systems which only load 1 CD.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Bose Music Machine
customer_reviews.text: A very well made unit that performs as well as they advertise. The 3 CD changer accessory unit works beautifuly with it. An expensive unit but you get what you pay for. If you can afford it you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald L.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Unit
customer_reviews.text: This unit was above any expectations we had, I have read articles on th Bose Wave but I never expected the volumn and quality of sound that came out of it. I would recommend the Bose to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard J. Sherlinski

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing device. I had a chance to listen to this music system in Las Vegas at Red Rock Hotel. Simply amazing. Back to NY I ordered one from Amazon. A little expensive bur once I received it I forgot about the price. For people that complain about the lack of buttons did you know that there is a Integrated Controller sold for $39 by Bose? [...]
customer_reviews.author: Brad R

customer_reviews.title: I've trusted Amazon until now, but never again. This item is usless unless you buy another $500 of Bose equipment. to connect it
customer_reviews.text: This product may be fine, but I'm VERY displeased with information provided by Amazon stating that this is a stand alone option needing nothing else to work. This WRONG. You must buy a WAVE III music system costing about $500 for this to be used. There is no way this could be connected to a non-Bose amplifier.
customer_reviews.author: paulscott

customer_reviews.title: Bose
customer_reviews.text: I love my radio. Now I want the newer version (the ToGo one). My kids all thought it was too much money for a radio, but I love the sound.
customer_reviews.author: ml

customer_reviews.title: over rated
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product on behalf of my parents. Personally, I don't think the sound quality is worth almost $500.00. This seems more of a status symbol than genuine value for the price. But then my tastes are pretty simple.
customer_reviews.author: angelem

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: didn't work (those things happen) but my experience returning this item was SUPERB !
customer_reviews.author: Joe M. Homra

customer_reviews.title: super sound
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best sound system that I have ever owned. It is sharp, clear and compact. It is even better that my reel to reel with my four huge speakers....
customer_reviews.author: Ishmail L. Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Wave Multi-CD changer
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it for my sister and her husband for their anniversary and they just love it, play it most of the time now!
customer_reviews.author: Mable E. Mullen

customer_reviews.title: have had it for years
customer_reviews.text: this thing never lets you down. high quality sound and construction. it sits off to the side and delivers big sound
customer_reviews.author: Poseidon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: However, the cord keep falling out of the back. Sound is great and operation is easy. Bose is really the best.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like being in a symphony
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my sister and she says listening to it makes her feel like she is in the middle of a symphony.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this system, the sound is amazing. It is very easy to set up, instructions are simple and precise. I love all Bose products
customer_reviews.author: Loubr

customer_reviews.title: BOSE
customer_reviews.text: BEST THING I EVER BOUGHT TO ADD TO MY BOSE!
customer_reviews.author: CINDY WATSON

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat Bose quality, little expensive but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Frank M. Coury

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: everything i always heard it was. should have gotten one years ago
customer_reviews.author: Trish Austin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound, perfect connection to our Wave radio with the programing CD included with the Changer.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Mullen

customer_reviews.title: CD changer
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. I matched the CD changer to a four year old base and the changer worked just fine. Great product. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Who couldnt love a Bose?
customer_reviews.text: But NEVER try to buy one piece to fit on another piece you already have online. What a disaster. Bose made it right, but it took 2 months and lots of phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie C. Westwood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: I already have a Bose identical to this one---in another room, so I know how it's supposed to perform---and it's just as good. To think that I paid far under the price of a new one is such an excellent bonus. I am very pleased with my purchase and dealing with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Duncan

customer_reviews.title: I have enjoyed listening!
customer_reviews.text: I have seen the ads for a few years and have wanted one. Saw one on your site and decided to order it. I have enjoyed listening!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bose
customer_reviews.text: We are totally enjoying our Bose Radio/CD. Sound quality is excellent and the casing is small - fits anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: neen

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the basic Bose system I really wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I chose to purchase this single-disk player via Amazon because it was really the model I wanted. It works great, has excellent sound (which I expected) and is perfect for the bedside with a sleep times. For the month of December, I'll be heading off to dreamland with holiday music. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: matthew1

customer_reviews.title: Bose Wave Music System - Graphite Gray
customer_reviews.text: I'd purchsed a $50 boom box from Sony that has severe distortion. The Bose unit seems overpriced at $5450 but at least it delivers decent sound.
customer_reviews.author: benny frenchie

customer_reviews.title: The finest in music playing equipment.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice anywhere. Easy to use. Great sound quality for CD's. The radio plays fine but the AM stations don't come in as well as the FM ones.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: Whats not to Love?
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Mother who called me and said she feels like eh's died and gone to heaven. When an 82 year old says that, having heard music in many forms from many sources is testimony of the quality of music the Bose system is capable of and sufficient for me to want one as well!
customer_reviews.author: David Waters

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: This item was received in perfect condition and quickly. Just plugged it in and we had great sound for the holidays. I'm sure there are other products with higher fidelity but for us this item was perfect. We connected it to the big screen and listened to the star wars movie. I thought the storm troopers were coming in the doorway!
customer_reviews.author: Zann

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but a good value.
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to the Wedge as a alternative to the Bose Wave. When I received the Wedge, I was extremely disappointed with the sound quality, expecially the base response. After hearing the Wave, at my church, I decided I wanted a Wave. I just returned the Wedge. Randy
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Can use the Charger because it must be "Installed" with the Radio with a CD
customer_reviews.text: In order to 'Install" this product with the Bose Waver Radio III, the radio must have a CD player to connect the two pieces. Since both pieces were Bose Wave products, I am very disappointed because I cannot even use this piece because the Radio did not include the CD changer. There was nothing I saw to indicate the Radio must have the CD Changer in order to use this product. I assumed I plugged them together and the CD Changer would work. Very disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my bose radio. I use it every day and even out by the pool...
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN HERRINGTON

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is everything I expected, and I'm very glad that I ordered it. It was just as advertised, arrived safely. Five stars for sure. I've wanted a Bose for years and was so delighted to be able to buy this one. Mary
customer_reviews.author: Mary Soyenova

customer_reviews.title: and love it! A great addition to our Bose wave ...
customer_reviews.text: I would buy from this seller again--received my Bose cd changer rather quickly, and love it! A great addition to our Bose wave lll unit! So nice to be able to play more than one cd. Yes, it is a little noisy when it changes tracks as others have stated, but so what! It is a nice compact stereo system with clear crisp sound, and attractive as well. So glad we bought this system before it was discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: L.A.

customer_reviews.title: The BEST present I ever bought myself!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Bose Music System has a GREAT sound!!! It 's sleek look fits anywhere in a room. Also, it is very easy to use. The directions are simple to read, very important to a senior citizen. I highly recommend this product. Shirley Ross Brown
customer_reviews.author: S R B

customer_reviews.title: Bose Wave music System
customer_reviews.text: After shopping a dozen stores and listening to who knows how many systems, large and small, I found the Bose Wave Music system to be in a class by itself. Yes, it is expensive, but the sound quality makes it well worth the price. The sound fills the room, and spills into neighboring rooms in a magnificent manner.
customer_reviews.author: Poldet

customer_reviews.title: Bose Wave Radio excellent model
customer_reviews.text: Great system loud and clear speakers, and the CD works wonderful. Good product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A program to alarm at seven am is proving difficult to change.
customer_reviews.author: John Hall

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I still have not figured out if I can control it without the remote, I see no buttons no where on the radio itself. But it is great, I listen to Andrea Bocceli at night to fall asleep and it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Lopez

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure this product is great; I thought I was ordering the BOSE player
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this product is great; I thought I was ordering the BOSE player, when in fact, I ordered the CD changer...(!!) Totally my fault. I sent it back because we decided to go with a less expensive alternative to playing music at home.
customer_reviews.author: Diane I. Wieland

customer_reviews.title: My wife loved it
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time and was put to use immediately, It has been working since its arrival almost no stop. My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bose system was in great shape as he said
customer_reviews.text: The sale mailed quickly as he stated .Bose system was in great shape as he said .I love it and enjoy it a lot .Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Didi Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: No response from the seller
customer_reviews.text: I bought this by mistake since I wanted the actual player not the changer but the seller has not returned my email since two days ago. I will update if they finally do. I also did aggressive review of Bose and found out that it is simply way too over priced. So, I decided to not buy it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rad

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an addition to my Bose Cd player and it works great. Comes with a CD to update so that they work together. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: blanca. dimeglio

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Had this item before lasted for 7 years i like bose products have other items i am very pleased with this
customer_reviews.author: Heike B Mueller

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it,Good quality with half price. All I need to do is replace dead battery and enjoy the good sound of Bose Wave Music System
customer_reviews.author: lieuphanphi

customer_reviews.title: AM stations
customer_reviews.text: We had to return this product. The sound was good. We may live in a "dead zone" but we can only pick up some AM stations with very old radios. We wanted to upgrade, but didn't want to sacrifice listening to our favorite Yankton, SD station. The return process went very smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Bose Wave Music System (Graphite Gray) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
Color:Graphite GrayThe acclaimed Wave music system still sets the standard for quality audio and ease of use among one-piece, table top radios and bookshelf stereos. Its award-winning design adds a touch of distinction to almost any room. It's no surprise so many people use it as their main home entertainment system for music listening. Proprietary waveguide speaker technology enables full-bodied sound, especially in lower registers, for more natural-sounding bass and percussion instruments. Slim remote conveniently controls Wave radio and CD player functions. The infrared remote control lets you conveniently operate Wave music system functions from anywhere in the room.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


BOSE - BETTER SOUND THROUGH RESEARCH
Dedication to research and excellence. It's been the Bose approach to better sound since Dr. Amar G. Bose founded the company in 1964. Since those early days, Bose engineers have kept their focus on creating better technology. You'll find that focus exemplified in the Wave music system, with advances that ensure premium performance and convenience. 

The acclaimed Wave music system still sets the standard for quality audio and ease of use among one-piece, table top stereos. Its award-winning design adds a touch of distinction to almost any room. No wonder so many people use it as their main home entertainment system. 






Sleek, elegant design feels at home in any room. Shown in Graphite Gray 


This easy-to-use infrared remote lets you operate your 
Wave music system from anywhere in the room HEARTY SOUND FROM A COMPACT SYSTEM
Bose Technology at Work 

Unique Bose innovations account for this compact system's hearty sound. Proprietary waveguide speaker technology combines with other Bose audio refinements to deliver performance well beyond the speakers' size. 

Simplicity by Design 

The Wave music system was engineered for easy enjoyment right out of the box. No setup required: just plug it in and you're ready to go. The FM/AM radio and CD player are built in. There's an auxiliary input for your MP3 or other portable player, and a headphone jack for keeping the music to yourself. 

The system's sleek appearance is uninterrupted by buttons, with all controls on a handy, slim remote. The large display panel is brightly lit and easy to read, prominently displaying the artist, title and album names of your MP3 CDs. 
Two waveguides are precisely tuned to reproduce 
lifelike sound from a small enclosure 

Waveguide Speaker Technology 

Two 26-inch folded waveguides are precisely tuned to amplify the output from the transducers (speakers) to reproduce lifelike sound from a small enclosure. 

Wave Music System Highlights 

Proprietary waveguide speaker technology enables full-bodied sound, especially in lower registers, for more natural-sounding bass and percussion instruments. 

Slim infrared remote control lets you conveniently control system functions from just about anywhere in the room. 

Slot-loaded CD player easily loads CDs or MP3 CDs. The front-loading design permits more placement options than traditional bookshelf stereos. 

Large visual display with adjustable brightness and automatic nighttime dimming enhances viewing of clock radio display, as well as indicates audio source and shows track, title and artist on suitably encoded MP3 CDs. 

Digital FM/AM tuner with seek function provides easy access to your favorite radio programs with built-in FM/AM antennas, including memory settings for six FM and six AM stations. 

Automatic ramping creates a more pleasant listening experience. Volume starts low and gently increases when the unit is turned on or alarm clock is activated. 

Shielded speakers prevent TV and computer picture interference for more placement flexibility. 

Headphone jack enables private listening. 

Auxiliary input jack lets you enjoy your TV, computer or another audio source through your Wave system. 

Bose link easily connects your Wave system to a compatible Lifestyle system for an expanded home entertainment network. 

What's in the Box 

 * Wave music system 
 * AC power cord 
 * Remote control 
 * Demonstration CD







WAVE MUSIC SYSTEM ACCESSORIES
>  Wave Connect Kit for iPod--Just what you need to play your iPod through a Wave music system. Connect kit is compatible with most iPod models and includes a docking station that charges your iPod and a custom remote that controls both iPod and Wave system. Wave Music System Multi-CD Changer--Enjoy extra hours of uninterrupted CD music. Slide one CD or MP3 CD into the Wave music system's front slot, and up to three more into this optional multi-CD changer. The easy-to-use changer is seamlessly controlled by the Wave music system remote and provides an additional connection for another audio source. 






SIMILAR BOSE PRODUCTS TO CONSIDER
>  Acoustic Wave Music System II--The best Bose all-in-one music system performs like large component systems costing much more--with far less complication and clutter. Advanced Bose technologies deliver sound with clarity and consistency, at loud or soft volume levels, even in larger rooms and outdoor spaces. The system plays audio and MP3 CDs plus FM/AM radio. An optional travel case and power pack make portability easy. Wave Music System - SoundLink--The Wave music system - SoundLink plays audio from your computer in any room, wirelessly. So, sources like iTunes and Internet radio can now join your CDs and favorite FM/AM stations in one listening area--all from one system. It's easy, too, with just two quick connections. A custom remote lets you navigate your playlists and switch between computer and system audio at the press of a button. And you'll enjoy all your music even more with acclaimed Wave music system performance. The Wave music system - SoundLink: a great leap forward in versatility and convenience from the most popular Bose tabletop system.
feature_bullets: Simple to set up and use
